replies.bodyText:
@maxandersen the reason behind having version.name is that using yaml defining multiple name.version isn't really elegant:
name1:
  version: 1.0
name2:
  version: 3.0
...
The difference is that here we only define versions, for quarkus or platform we also define artifact-id and group-id.
Maybe the name.version even if less elegant would make it more consistant?
